Sons of Behemat (Age of Sigmar) [1,980pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Destruction - Sons of Behemat) [1,980pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [970pts]

      • Kraken-Eater Mega-Gargant [490pts]

        Selections: Almighty Stomp, Death Grip, Hurled Debris, Shipwrecka Warclub

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, Behemoth, HERO, KRAKEN-EATER, Leader, MEGA-GARGANT, GARGANT

        Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Kraken-Eater Mega-Gargant, Unit Abilities: Almighty Stomp, Crushing Charge, Death Grip, Get Orf Me Land!, Longshanks, Son of Behemat, Stuff 'Em In Me Net, Terror, Timberrrrr!, Weapon: Almighty Stomp, Death Grip, Hurled Debris, Shipwrecka Warclub


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMoveShipwrecka WarclubHurled Debris
        Wounds1 0-1211"824"
        Wounds2 13-1810"721"
        Wounds3 19-249"718"
        Wounds4 25-308"615"
        Wounds5 31+7"512"
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Kraken-Eater Mega-Gargant *3574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Almighty Stomp You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Almighty Stomp attacks unless the target is a MONSTER.
        Crushing Charge After this model makes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds if it is a MONSTER, or D6 mortal wounds if it is not a MONSTER.
        Death Grip You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Death Grip attacks that target a MONSTER.
        Get Orf Me Land! In your hero phase, if you have any models with this ability within 1" of an objective that you control, you can pick one of those models and say that it will kick the objective away. If you do so, you can move that objective up to 2D6" to a new position on the battlefield, more than 1" away from any models, terrain features or other objectives. An objective cannot be kicked away more than once in the same phase.
        Longshanks When this model makes a normal move, it can ignore models that have a Wounds characteristic of 10 or less, endless spells, magmic invocations, judgements of Khorne and terrain features that are less than 4" tall at their highest point. It cannot finish the move on top of another model or within 3" of an enemy model.
        Son of Behemat If a spell or ability would slay this model without any wounds or mortal wounds being inflicted by the spell or ability, this model suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Stuff 'Em In Me Net After this model piles in, you can pick up to D3 enemy models within 3" of this model and roll a dice for each of them. If the roll is at least double that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Terror Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units if they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.
        Timberrrrr! If this model is slain, before removing the model from the battlefield, the players must roll off. The winner must pick a point on the battlefield 5" from this model. Each unit within 3" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds unless it is a MEGA-GARGANT. This model is then removed from the battlefield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Almighty Stomp Melee2"23+3+-2D3
        Death Grip Melee3"13+2+-3D6
        Hurled Debris Missile*34+3+-1D3
        Shipwrecka Warclub Melee3"*3+3+-22

      • Warstompa Mega-Gargant [480pts]

        Selections: 1. Monstrously Tough, 3. Mantle of the Destroyer, Death Grip, General, Jump Up and Down, Titanic Boulderclub

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, Behemoth, HERO, Leader, MEGA-GARGANT, GARGANT, WARSTOMPA, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Mantle of the Destroyer, Command Trait: Monstrously Tough, Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Warstompa Mega-Gargant, Unit Abilities: Almighty Jump, Crushing Charge, Death Grip, Hurled Body, Longshanks, Son of Behemat, Terror, Timberrrrr!, Titanic Boulderclub, Weapon: Death Grip, Jump Up and Down, Titanic Boulderclub


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Mantle of the Destroyer Friendly GARGANTS have a Bravery characteristic of 10 while they are within 12" of the bearer. In addition you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly GARGANTS that are within 12" of the bearer.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Monstrously Tough This general has a Wounds characteristic of 40 instead of 35.
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMoveTitanic BoulderclubHurled Body
        Wounds1 0-1210"+4+2
        Wounds2 13-189"+3+1
        Wounds3 19-248"+20
        Wounds4 25-307"+1-1
        Wounds5 31+6"0-2 "
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Warstompa Mega-Gargant *3574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Almighty Jump You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Jump Up and Down attacks unless the target is a MONSTER.
        Crushing Charge After this model makes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds if it is a MONSTER, or D6 mortal wounds if it is not a MONSTER.
        Death Grip You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Death Grip attacks that target a MONSTER.
        Hurled Body Once per combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy model within 3" of this model and roll a dice. Add the Hurled Body modifier shown on this model’s damage table to the roll. If the roll is at least double that enemy model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain and you can roll another dice. On a 4+, you can pick an enemy unit within 12" of this model and visible to it. That unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the Wounds characteristic of the slain model.
        Longshanks When this model makes a normal move, it can ignore models that have a Wounds characteristic of 10 or less, endless spells, magmic invocations, judgements of Khorne and terrain features that are less than 4" tall at their highest point. It cannot finish the move on top of another model or within 3" of an enemy model.
        Son of Behemat If a spell or ability would slay this model without any wounds or mortal wounds being inflicted by the spell or ability, this model suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Terror Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units if they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.
        Timberrrrr! If this model is slain, before removing the model from the battlefield, the players must roll off. The winner must pick a point on the battlefield 5" from this model. Each unit within 3" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds unless it is a MEGA-GARGANT. This model is then removed from the battlefield.
        Titanic Boulderclub The Attacks characteristic of a Titanic Boulderclub is equal to the number of enemy models within 3" of the attacking model. Add the Titanic Boulderclub value on the attacking model’s damage table to the total, and add 4 to the total for each enemy MONSTER within 3" of the attacking model. If the modified Attacks characteristic of the Titanic Boulderclub is less than 1, count it as being 1, and if the modified Attacks characteristic of the Titanic Boulderclub is more than 10, count it as being 10.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Death Grip Melee3"13+2+-3D6
        Jump Up and Down Melee3"43+3+-2D3
        Titanic Boulderclub Melee3"*3+3+-22

    • Battleline [960pts]

      • Mancrusher Gargants [480pts]

        Selections: 'Eadbutt, 3x Mancrusher Gargant [480pts], Massive Club, Mighty Kick

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, HERO, KRAKEN-EATER, MEGA-GARGANT, GARGANT, Battleline

        Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Mancrusher Gargant, Unit Abilities: Keep Up!, Stomping Charge, Stuff 'Em In Me Bag, Timber!, Weapon: 'Eadbutt, Massive Club, Mighty Kick


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedStomping ChargeMassive Club'Eadbutt
        Wounds1 0-22+104
        Wounds2 3-43+93
        Wounds3 5-74+818"
        Wounds4 8-95+62
        Wounds5 10+6+51
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Mancrusher Gargant 8"1275+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Keep Up! If this unit is within 12" of a friendly MEGA-GARGANT at the start of the charge phase, it can attempt to charge in that charge phase even if it ran in the same turn.
        Stomping Charge After a model from this unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of it and roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or greater than the Stomping Charge value for the charging model shown on the damage table above, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If this unit has more than 1 model, do not allocate the mortal wounds until all of the models in this unit have made their charge moves.
        Stuff 'Em In Me Bag After a model from this unit piles in, you can pick 1 enemy model within 3" of it and roll a dice. If the roll is at least double that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Timber! If a model from this unit is slain, before removing it from the battlefield, the players must roll off. The winner must pick a point on the battlefield 3" from that model. Each unit within 2" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds unless it is a GARGANT. The model is then removed from the battlefield.

        'Eadbutt Melee1"14+3+-3*
        Massive Club Melee3"*3+3+-11
        Mighty Kick Melee2"13+3+-2D3

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Sons of Behemat

          Selections: Stomper Tribe

          Battle Trait: Big Shouts, Chuck Rocks, Getting Stuck In, Mightier Makes Rightier, Command Abilities: Get a Move On, You Slackers!, Grab ThoseRocks and Chuck ’Em at Somethin’!, Oi, You! Yes, You! Charge!, Stop Muckin’ About and Hit ’Em!, Watch Yer Backs, You Gormless Lot!, Where Do You Think You’re Going?, Weapon: Chuck Rocks


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Big Shouts If your army is a Stomper Tribe, your general must use the following Big Shout command abilities (they cannot use any other command abilities):
        Chuck Rocks In your shooting phase, you can pick 1 friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT unit wholly within 18" of your general. Each model in that unit can make a shooting attack with the Chuck Rocks missile weapon below:
        Getting Stuck In Add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made by a friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT unit that targets a unit with 10 or more models. Add 2 instead of 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made by a friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT unit that targets a unit with 20 or more models.
        Mightier Makes Rightier When determining control of an objective, each friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT model counts as 10 models instead of 1, and each friendly MEGAGARGANT counts as 20 models instead of 1.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Get a Move On, You Slackers! You can use this command ability at the start of your movement phase. If you do so, until the end of that phase, if you make a run roll for a friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT unit that is within 18" of your general, that roll is treated as being 6.
        Grab ThoseRocks and Chuck ’Em at Somethin’! You can use this command ability at the start of your shooting phase. If you do so, when you use the Chuck Rocks battle trait (pg 57), you can pick all friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT units within 18" of your general to make Chuck Rocks shooting attacks, instead of only 1 unit.
        Oi, You! Yes, You! Charge! You can use this command ability at the start of your charge phase. If you do so, until the end of that phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT units that are within 18" of your general.
        Stop Muckin’ About and Hit ’Em! You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, until the end of that phase, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT units that are within 18" of your general.
        Watch Yer Backs, You Gormless Lot! You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, until the end of that phase, you can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT units that are within 18" of your general.
        Where Do You Think You’re Going? You can use this command ability at the start of your battleshock phase. If you do so, until the end of that phase, do not take battleshock tests for friendly MANCRUSHER GARGANT units that are within 18" of your general.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Chuck Rocks Missile18"D34+3+-1D3

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [50pts]

      • Endless Spell: Emerald Lifeswarm [50pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, EMERALD LIFESWORM, GHYRAN, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Emerald Lifeswarm, Unit Abilities: Bounteous Healing, Empowered by Ghyran, Fly, Predatory


        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Summon Emerald Lifeswarm 6If successfully cast, set up an Emerald Lifeswarm model wholly within 15" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Bounteous Healing After this model is set up or after it has moved, pick 1 unit within 1" of it. You can either heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to that unit or, if no wounds are currently allocated to the unit, you may return a number of slain models to it that have a combined Wounds characteristic equal to or less than the roll of a D3.
        Empowered by Ghyran If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Life, roll a D6 to determine the number of wounds healed or wounds worth of slain models returned by the Emerald Lifeswarm’s Bounteous Healing ability.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory An Emerald Lifeswarm is a predatory endless spell. Emerald Lifeswarms can move up to 10" and can fly.

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6.

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll.

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase.
